body_html:
The last merge had some memory leak fixes, but doesn't seem to address this one, same behavior against
ea94bbe

cc @reedwm in case he knows who is in charge of leaks

Some additional notes:

  1. Leak only happens when adding new tensors to the graph.
  2. Closing/reopening the session reclaims memory.

ea94bbe

Leak only happens when adding new tensors to the graph.
Closing/reopening the session reclaims memory.
body:
The last merge had some memory leak fixes, but doesn't seem to address this one, same behavior against
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/ea94bbe9fa9f9b3d01fb057c02ef7873d76bf09c

cc @reedwm in case he knows who is in charge of leaks

Some additional notes:
1. Leak only happens when adding new tensors to the graph. 
2. Closing/reopening the session reclaims memory.
